renderpass.code:
void mainImage (out vec4 a, vec2 b) {
	vec2 c = iResolution.xy, d = (b + b - c) / c.y * 6.,	/* Normalization of the fragment coordinates	*/
		e = d + 5. * cos (vec2 (0., 1.57) + iTime);			/* Position of the little black circle			*/
	c = floor (d) * .5;										/* The plan is seen as a grid of squares		*/
	a = vec4 (0., .5 + .5 * fract (c.x + c.y), .5, 1.);		/* Squares' colors (light/dark green)			*/
	c = round (d) / .1;										/* Get the ID of the green squares' corners		*/
	a = mix (a, vec4 (1., vec2 (cos (c.x + c.y) > 0.), 1.),	/* Crosses' colors are cosines of these IDs		*/
		smoothstep (.4, .41, dot (d = fract (d) - .5, d)))	/* Add crosses in the green squares' corners	*/
		* smoothstep (0., .1, dot (e, e));					/* Little black circle							*/
}
renderpass.name: Image
